page.title: Zarf
page.text:
Zarf is a historical holder or sleeve used to insulate hot beverage cups in the 19th century.
==References== *[[Cup sleeve]] *[[Tableware]] *[[Beverage history|(https://us.coca-cola.com/)]]

page.title: Cup sleeve
page.text:
A zarf (see *[[Zarf]]) is a cup sleeve.
==See also== *[[Tableware]]
